name: Beginner's Ceremony
subtitle: Beginner's Ceremony
desc:
The slumbering Sea of Chaos
awakens upon the Voyager's arrival.
Prepare for various events and 
set sail towards the shining beacons!
desc_tips: Participate in the series of events to get SSR characters, Hope Luxites, Secret Fates, furniture, and other rewards.

subtitle: 7-Day Promise

name: The Uncrowned

name: The Fool's Journey
subtitle: The Fool's Journey
desc:
Voyager, time to set sail! 

Chapter 7 - Knight's Lance is now available. 

Chapter 8 - Moment of Doom is now available. 

Clear Stage 8-5 to unlock new feature: Gear Engraving.
desc_tips: Complete Chapter 6 of [The Fool's Journey] and reach a certain Voyager Level to unlock new chapters.

name: The Fool's Journey
subtitle: The Fool's Journey
desc:
Voyager, time to set sail! 

Chapter 9 - The Birdcage is now available. 

Chapter 10 - The Hanged Men is now available.
desc_tips: Complete Chapter 8 of [The Fool's Journey] and reach a certain Voyager Level to unlock new chapters.

name: Elysium Feast
desc: Maitha is throwing a grand banquet to welcome her new friends to Elysium. But things are not going as smoothly as planned…
desc_tips: During the event, take part in the time-limited activity [Fight! Elysium Feast] to win limited avatar frames and furniture and exchange for numerous enhancement items.

desc:
Unknown creatures have appeared in the Sea of Chaos,
heralding the shadow of Calamity…
desc_tips: During the event, take part in the time-limited activity [Flame and Power of Rebirth] to win limited avatar frames and furniture and exchange for numerous enhancement items.

Beneath the vortex of the Sea of Chaos, the ancient seals have begun to loosen.

The power from "Inversion," the other side of the world, has now revealed itself…

name: Elysium Welcome Gift
editor_name: 回归系列活动 - 首日大礼
desc:
Boss and Faycal talk every day about when you will return, 
and Maitha has a lot of things to tell you… 
Plus, there's a mountain of gifts that everyone has prepared for you. Come take a look!
desc_tips:
Leader, welcome back to Sword of Convallaria!

Partners have prepared a variety of return events for you, including the [Elysium Welcome Gift] shown on this page as well as the [Awakening Blessing] and [Port-return Gift] on the Elysium home page. Participate in the series of return events to gain great rewards easily!

※ The [Port-return Gift] will be available on the 7th day of your return.

subtitle: Everything Has Its Price
desc: As for him who holds the scales, has he calculated his own worth?
desc_tips: During the event, participate in the limited-time event [Traders from Desert] to win limited avatar frames and furniture and exchange for plenty of enhancement items.

desc: Sweat dripping onto the dock, the rattling of weapon crates, a covered face in the shadows… Amidst the clamor, coins clink into bags, and a bundle of Convallaria tips the scale.

name: Verdure Delight
desc_tips:
Each wish consuming a Wish Coupon guarantees a prize, and you will obtain all prizes in the 1st round with 13 wishes. After receiving the ultimate prize or all prizes of the 1st round, you can enter the 2nd round.

Within each round, the number of Wish Coupons consumed increases gradually, in proper order of 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 20, 24 and 28 coupons.

Basic probability for the first 3 wishes of each round: Ultimate prize: 0%, Level II: 1.5%, Level III: 5%, Level IV: 15.1%.

From the 4th wish of each round, the ultimate prize is added, with the basic probability as: Ultimate prize: 0.5%, Level II: 1.5%, Level III: 5%, Level IV: 15%. The probability shifts to other prizes after a prize is obtained.

name: Wishing Machine
desc:
Put designated items into the Wishing Machine and recite the wishing spell to obtain great rewards.
You can unlock a new reward every day you log in. Let's see what wish the wishing machine will grant you today.
desc_tips:
Put designated items into the Wishing Machine and recite the wishing spell to obtain great rewards.
You can unlock a new reward every day you log in. Let's see what wish the wishing machine will grant you today.
The rewards from wishing are not related to the quality of the resources invested, so try to put in some items you don't need!

name: cn_Jigsaw Event
subtitle: cn_Jigsaw Event
desc: cn_Jigsaw Event
desc_tips:
[Event Quests]
1. You can complete 2 quests daily, and the quests reset at 00:00 every day.
2. Quest rewards need to be claimed manually; please claim them before reset.

[Event Rewards]
1. Complete daily quests to obtain Heartscape Shard and Hope Luxites rewards.
2. Completing the Heartscape Vista puzzle grants a title reward; first sharing and information previewing also grant additional Hope Luxites rewards. Sharing rewards will be sent to the mailbox.
3. A total of 16 Heartscape Shards can be obtained through quests, and no more shards or quest rewards can be obtained once the limit is reached.

[Event Quests]

[Event Rewards]

name: Adventure Invite, Convallaria Gifts
desc:
Everyone in Elysium is ready for the return of the Leader! 
Active Leaders can invite returning Leaders to complete Welcome Back quests together and claim various rewards!
desc_tips:
During the event, leaders can share their personal invite codes, inviting leaders who have not logged in for more than 60 days, and Voyager Level higher than Lv. 15 to participate in the event, and returning leaders who successfully bind the invite code can obtain Hope Luxites rewards.
After logging into the game, returning leaders can also share their personal invite codes, inviting other eligible leaders to return, complete the invitation quest, and obtain Hope Luxites and other rewards.

name: Voyage of Discovery
desc:
A strange secret realm appears deep in the Sea of Chaos…
Get equipped, bring snacks, and start a new round of adventure!
desc_tips: During the event, participate in the time-limited event [Voyage of Discovery] to exchange for plenty of items.
